attributes.action: Change the rules for EMA allowances to allow families recently made redundant to qualify for payouts for 2009-2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Emas are granted to students whose families earn under 30k pa however for students starting college etc sep 2009 to 2010 the payouts are based on 2008 earnings not good enough for families now redundant and suffering due this governments mishandling of the economy
